QuestData.Title: Simian Sabotage
QuestData.Description: The hozen steal from us, and we keep stealing our stuff back. It has to stop sometime.$b$b<Farmer Yoon hands you a barrel of fireworks.>$b$bFind some of our stolen supplies in their mountain camp to the west, and place these fireworks beside them. Hopefully, if they see the explosions, they'll think our supplies are defective and stop stealing altogether.$b$bIt's worth a shot, right?
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Barrel of Fireworks near the Pile of Stolen Weapons, the Pile of Stolen Tools, the Pile of Stolen Beer, and the Pile of Stolen Grain.
